1.verse_text: What delight comes to the one who follows God’s ways! He won’t walk in step with the wicked, nor share the sinner’s way, nor be found sitting in the scorner’s seat. deeply rooted by the brooks of bliss, bearing fruit in every season of life. He is never dry, never fainting, for God will not defend them. Nothing they do will succeed or endure for long, for they have no part with those who walk in truth. The Lord embraces their paths as they move forward while the way of the wicked leads only to doom.

His passion is to remain true to the Word of “I AM,” meditating day and night on the true revelation of light. planted by God’s design, ever blessed, ever prosperous. They are like chaff blown away by the wind.
He will be standing firm like a flourishing tree
But how different are the wicked.
The wicked will not endure the day of judgment,
But how different it is for the righteous!

2.verse_text: How dare the nations plan a rebellion. Their foolish plots are futile! of God and his Christ!” he settles the issue and terrifies them to death with these words: crushing their rebellion as an iron rod smashes jars of clay!’ ” Learn your lesson while there’s still time . trembling with reverence in his presence.

Look at how the power brokers of the world rise up to hold their summit as the rulers scheme and confer together against Yahweh and his Anointed King, saying: Once and for all let’s cast off these controlling chains the Sovereign One mocks their madness! For he has decreed over me, ‘You are my favored Son. And as your Father I have crowned you as my King Eternal. Today I became your Father. and they shall become your legacy. Your domain will stretch to the ends of the earth. and all you upstart judges of the earth. Recognize his greatness and bow before him, before his anger is roused against you. Remember that his wrath can be quickly kindled! But many blessings are waiting for all who turn aside to hide themselves in him!”
“Let’s come together and break away from the Creator.
Then with the fierceness of his fiery anger,
“I myself have poured out my King on Zion, my holy mountain.”
“I will reveal the eternal purpose of God.
Ask me to give you the nations and I will do it,
And you will shepherd them with unlimited authority,
“Listen to me, all you rebel kings
Serve and worship the awe-inspiring God.
Fall facedown before him and kiss the Son

3.verse_text: Lord, I have so many enemies, so many who are against me.

Listen to how they whisper their slander against me, saying: “Look! He’s hopeless! Even God can’t save him from this!” that you, Yahweh, have become my Shield; You send me a Father’s help. Pause in his presence then I’ll awake in safety, for you surround me with your glory. I won’t be afraid. For you will slap them in the face, What a feast of favor and bliss he gives his people! Pause in his presence Pause in his presence You take me and surround me with yourself. Your glory covers me continually. You lift high my head. breaking the power of their words to harm me.
But in the depths of my heart I truly know
I have cried out to you, Yahweh, from your holy presence.
So now I’ll lie down and sleep like a baby—
Even though ten thousand dark powers prowl around me,
Rise up and help me, Yahweh! Come and save me, God!
For the Lord alone is my Savior.

4.verse_text: God, you are my righteousness, my Champion Defender. Answer me when I cry for help! I’m being squeezed again—I need your kindness right away! Grant me your grace, hear my prayer, and set me free! and drag it down into shame? Will you ever stop insulting me? How long will you set your heart on shadows, chasing your lies and delusions? Pause in his presence for every one of his devoted lovers. And this is how I know that he will answer my every prayer. Pause in his presence Let the light of your radiant face break through and shine upon us! surpasses the gladness of harvest time, even more than when the harvesters gaze upon their ripened grain and when their new wine overflows. for no matter what happens, I will live unafraid! Whenever I was in distress, you enlarged me. How long will you defame my honor Be still upon your bed and search your heart before him.
Listen to me, you elite among men:
May we never forget that Yahweh works wonders
Tremble in awe before the Lord, and do not sin against him.
Bring to Yahweh the sacrifice of righteousness and put your trust in him.
Lord, prove them wrong when they say, “God can’t help you!”
The intense pleasure you give me
Now, because of you, Lord, I will lie down in peace and sleep comes at once,

5.verse_text: Listen, Yahweh, to my passionate prayer! Can’t you hear my groaning? My King and my God, consider my every word, for I am calling out to you. Every morning I lay out the pieces of my life on the altar and evil ones will never be invited into your house. for your hatred of evildoers is clear. How you hate their hypocrisy and despise all who love violence! for I am covered by your covenant of mercy and love. to bow in worship and adore you. just like you promised me you would, or else my enemies will conquer me. Smooth out your road in front of me, straight and level, so that I will know where to walk. Destruction is in their hearts, They are smooth-tongued deceivers, flattering with their words. Let their own schemes be their downfall! Let the guilt of their sins collapse on top of them, for they rebel against you. those who turn aside to hide themselves in you. May they keep shouting for joy forever! Overshadow them in your presence as they sing and rejoice. Then every lover of your name will burst forth with endless joy. Your favor wraps around each one and covers them under your canopy of kindness and joy.
Don’t you hear how I’m crying out to you?

At each and every sunrise you will hear my voice as I prepare my sacrifice of prayer to you. and wait for your fire to fall upon my heart . So I come to your sanctuary with deepest awe drawing people into their darkness with their speeches.
I know that you, God, are never pleased with lawlessness,
Boasters collapse, unable to survive your scrutiny,
You will make an end of all those who lie.
But I know that you will welcome me into your house,
Yahweh, lead me in the pathways of your pleasure
But let them all be glad,
Lord, how wonderfully you bless the righteous.

6.verse_text: Yahweh, don’t condemn me. Don’t punish me in your fiery anger. Heal me, Yahweh, for I’m falling apart. Yahweh—how long? How could I bring you praise if I’m buried in a tomb? Night after night I soak my pillow with tears, and has taken hold of my prayers and answered them all. Terror-stricken, they will turn back again,

Please deal gently with me , Yahweh; show me mercy, for I’m sick and frail and weak. because I know your faithful love will never fail me. and flood my bed with weeping. There are so many enemies who come against me! For Yahweh has turned to hear the sound of my weeping. knowing the bitterness of sudden disgrace!
My soul is so troubled; but you,
Yahweh, turn to me and rescue my life
In the darkness of death who remembers your name in worship ?
I’m worn out with my weeping and groaning.
My eyes of faith won’t focus anymore, for sorrow fills my heart.
Turn from me, all you troublemakers!
Yes! Yahweh my healer has heard all my pleading
Now it’s my enemies who have been shamed.

7.verse_text: Yahweh, my God, I turn to hide my soul in you. Save me from all those who pursue and persecute me. Don’t let my foes fall upon me like fierce lions with teeth bared. Can’t you see how they want to rip my soul to shreds? and my hands are guilty, if I have betrayed a friend, repaying evil for good, or if I have unjustly harmed my enemy, Let them grind me into the ground. Let them take my life from me and drag my dignity through the dust! Pause in his presence Awaken your fury and stand up for me! Declare me innocent. Establish the cause of the righteous, for you are the righteous God, the soul searcher , who tests every heart You bring victory to all who are pure in heart. Because of the strength of your forgiveness, You have an arsenal of lethal weapons that you’ve prepared for them. You have bent and strung your bow, making your judgment-arrows shafts of burning fire. They go into labor with their lies and give birth to trouble. not knowing that they will be the very ones who will fall into it. will be trapped by his own treachery. for you make everything right in the end. I will sing my highest praise to the God of the Highest Place!
There is none to deliver me but you !
Yahweh, my God, if I have done evil like they say I have,
if I have wronged someone at peace with me,
Then let my enemy pursue and overtake me.

Yahweh, arise in your anger against the anger of my enemies. Execute the judgment you have decreed against them. Return to your place on high to preside over them. Vindicate me publicly , Yahweh, and restore my honor and integrity. to examine the thoughts and motives. your anger does not break out every day. you will not relent to sharpen your shining sword.
All the people gather around you.
You are Yahweh who judges the people.
Once and for all, bring to an end the evil tactics of the wicked!
God, your wraparound presence is my shield.
God, your righteousness is revealed when you judge.
Look how the wicked conceive their evil schemes.
They dig a pit for others to fall into ,
Every pit-digger who works to trap and harm others
But I will give my thanks to you, Yahweh,

8.verse_text: Yahweh, our Sovereign God, your glory streams from the heavens above, filling the earth with the majesty of your name! People everywhere see your splendor . Strength rises up with the chorus of infants. This kind of praise has power to shut Satan’s mouth. the madness of those who oppose you. your creative genius glowing in the heavens. When I gaze at your moon and your stars, mounted like jewels in their settings, I know you are the fascinating artist who fashioned it all! But I have to ask this question: rulership over all you have made, with everything under their authority, of the earth, sky, and sea— your glory streams from the heavens above, filling the earth with the majesty of your name! People everywhere see your splendor!

You have built a stronghold by the songs of children. Childlike worship will silence or care about human beings? created only a little lower than Elohim, crowned with glory and magnificence. placing earth itself under the feet of your image-bearers . the wildest beasts and all that move in the paths of the sea — everything is in submission to Adam’s sons .
Look at the splendor of your skies,
Why would you bother with puny, mortal man
Yet what honor you have given to men,

Then I will sing your praises as I pass through the gates
For the nations get trapped
Yahweh is famous for his justice.
Don’t forget this : all the wicked will one day

10.verse_text: Lord, why do you seem so far away when evil is near? Why have you hidden yourself when I need you the most? “The Lofty One is not watching while we do this. and seen their hopes .

The arrogant in their elitist pride persecute the poor and helpless. May you pour out upon them the very evil they’ve dreamed up against others! They congratulate themselves as they despise you— In their delusion the wicked boast, saying, “God doesn’t care about what we do. There’s nothing to worry about!” and prosperous in all their plans! Your laws are far from them; they scoff at their enemies. They sneer at all their enemies, saying in their hearts, “We’ll have success in all we do and never have to face trouble.” Only trouble and turmoil come from all their plans. they crouch silently in ambush, waiting for the innocent to pass by. Pouncing on the poor, they catch them in their snare to murder their prey in secret as they plunder their helpless victims. watching their victims collapse in defeat! He doesn’t even care! We can get away with it!” Don’t forget the helpless and oppressed. They say to themselves, “God won’t hold me accountable.” noting their each and every deed. You know the trouble and turmoil they’ve caused. Now punish them thoroughly for all that they’ve done! The poor and helpless ones trust in you, Lord, for you are famous for being the helper of the fatherless. I know you won’t let them down. Search them out and destroy them for the evil things they’ve done. All the nations will perish from your land. You will hear their cries and encourage their hearts. for you will bring them justice, and no earth-dweller will trouble them again.
How they brag and boast of their cravings, exalting the greedy.
these arrogant ones, so smug and secure!
So successful are they in their schemes
They boast that neither God nor men will bring them down.
Their mouths spew out cursing, lies, and threats.
They crush the lowly as they fall beneath their brutal blows,
Now arise, Yahweh-God! Crush them once and for all!
How dare the wicked think they’ll reject God and escape judgment.
Lord, I know you see all that they’re doing,
Break the power of the wicked and all their strong-arm tactics.
You, Yahweh, are King forever and ever!
Yahweh, you have heard the desires of the humble
The orphans and the oppressed will be terrified no longer,

11.verse_text: My faith shelters my soul continually in Yahweh. Why would you say to me: “ Run away while you can! Fly away like a bird to hide in the mountains for safety . Can’t you see them hiding in their place of darkness and shadows? They’re set against all those who live upright lives. when truth’s pillars are destroyed and law and order collapse?” he is still found in his temple of holiness, reigning as King Yahweh over all. He closely watches and examines everything man does. for his heavenly rule will prevail over all. God’s very soul detests lovers of violence. A scorching wind will be their lot in life. justice, and every godly one will gaze upon his face!
For your enemies have prepared a trap for you!
Yet Yahweh is never shaken — With a glance, his eyes examine every heart,
Yahweh tests both the righteous and the wicked .

But remember this: Yahweh is the Righteous One who loves

12.verse_text: Help, Lord! Save us! For godly ones are disappearing. Where are the dependable, principled ones? They’re a vanishing breed! Nothing but empty talk, smooth talk, and double-talk. Our words are our weapons, and we won’t be held accountable. Who can stop us?” May Yahweh cut off their twisted tongues and seal their lying lips. May they all be silenced—those who boast and brag with their high-minded talk. I will defend the poor, those who were plundered, the oppressed, and the needy who groan for help. I will spring into action to rescue and protect them!” His truth is tested, found to be flawless, and ever faithful. out of the reach of the wicked. Even though they strut and prowl, tolerating and celebrating what is worthless and vile, you will still lift up those who are yours !
Everyone lies, everyone flatters, and everyone deceives.
But the Lord says, “Now I will arise!
For every word Yahweh speaks is sure and reliable. It’s as pure as silver refined seven times in a crucible of clay.

13.verse_text: I’m hurting , Lord—will you forget me forever? How much longer, Lord? I’ve endured this shaking of my soul. So how much longer will my enemy have the upper hand? Breathe your life into my spirit. Bring light to my eyes in this pitch-black darkness or I will sleep the sleep of death. For all my adversaries will celebrate when I fall. I will spin in a circle of joy for in all of this you have strengthened my soul. My enemies say that I have no Savior, but I know that I have one in you! Will you look the other way when I’m in need? when your salvation lifts me up.
How much longer must I cling to this constant grief?
Take a good look at me, Yahweh, my God, and answer me!
Don’t let my enemy proclaim, “I’ve prevailed over him.”
I have always trusted in your kindness, so answer me .
I will sing my song of joy to you, Yahweh,

14.verse_text: Only the withering soul would say to himself, “There is no God.” Anyone who thinks like this is corrupt and callous, devoid of what is good. looking over all of Adam’s sons and daughters. He’s looking to see if there is anyone who acts wisely, any who are searching for God and wanting to please him. walking stubbornly toward evil. Not one is good; he can’t even find one. Won’t these workers of wickedness ever learn? They don’t ever think of praying to God. For God is on the side of his godly lovers . when the workers of wickedness oppress them. would arise from the midst of Zion! When Yahweh restores his people, Jacob’s joy will break forth and Israel will be glad!
They live in luxury while exploiting my people!
But look at them now, in panic, trembling with terror.
Yahweh is always the safest place for the poor
How I wish that Israel’s rescue

15.verse_text: Yahweh, who dares to dwell with you? Who presumes the privilege of being close to you, always sincere and always speaking the truth— for their hearts are trustworthy. they’ll never listen to gossip or rumors, nor would they ever harm a friend with their words. while commending the faithful ones who follow after the truth. They make firm commitments and follow through, even at great cost. and they would never be bought with a bribe against the innocent. Those who do these things will never be shaken; they will stand firm forever. living next to you in your shining place of glory?
They refuse to slander or insult others;
They will despise evil and evil workers
They never crush others with exploitation

16.verse_text: Keep me safe, O mighty God. I run to you, my safe place. “You are my Maker and my Master. Any good thing you find in me has come from you.” in the land are my glorious ones, who fulfill all my desires.” and they will have troubles unending. nor give them honor in any way. You are my prize, my pleasure, and my portion. You hold my destiny and its timing in your hands. I’m overwhelmed by the privileges that come with following you! for your whispers in the night give me wisdom, showing me what to do next. Even my body will rest confident and secure. as I taste the fullness of joy in your presence.
And he said to me , “My holy lovers

Yet there are those who yield to their weakness, I never gather with such ones, my confidence will never be weakened, for I experience your wraparound presence every moment. nor will you allow your Faithful One to experience corruption. At your right side I experience divine pleasures forevermore!
Yahweh, you alone are my inheritance.
Your pleasant path leads me to pleasant places.
The way you counsel me makes me praise you more,
Because I set you, Yahweh, always close to me,
My heart and soul explode with joy—full of glory!
For you will not abandon me to the realm of death,
Because of you, I know the path of life,

17.verse_text: Listen to me, Lord. Hear the passionate prayer of this honest man. My cause is just and my need is real. I’ve done what’s right and my lips speak truth. Vindicate me and show the world I’m innocent. you inspected my heart and refined my soul in fire until nothing vile was found in me. I will not sin with my words. Your ways have molded my footsteps, keeping me from going down the paths of the violent. always staying in their path, never straying from your way. Hear my words like you always do as you listen to my every prayer. You are the loving Savior of all who turn aside to hide themselves in you. who is reflected in the twinkling of your eye. Yes, hide me within the shelter of your embrace, For there are many who surround my soul to completely destroy me. swollen with pride and filled with arrogance! like young and fearless lions lurking in secret, so ferocious and cruel—ready to rip me to shreds. Free me from their clutches and rescue me from their rage. those who live for only this life on earth. Thrust them out of their prosperity and into their portion in eternity, leaving their wealth and wickedness behind! until I see you for who you really are. I will be satisfied in an awakening of your likeness in me !
For in a visitation of the night
Following your word has kept me from wrong.
My steps follow in the tracks of your chariot wheels,
You will answer me, God; I know you always will.
Magnify the marvels of your mercy to all who seek you.
Protect me from harm; keep an eye on me as you would a child under your outstretched wings. waiting for the chance to throw me to the ground. Challenge them with your might!
Protect me there from all my foes.
They are pitiless, heartless—hard as nails,
See how they close in on me,
They’re like lions eager to tear me apart,
Throw them down to the ground,
As for me, because I am innocent, I will see your face

18.verse_text: I love you, Yahweh, and I’m bonded to you, my strength! my faith-fortress, my wonderful deliverer, my God, my rock of rescue where none can reach me . You’re the shield around me, and my high place. Yahweh, the praiseworthy God. When I do, I’m safe and sound in you— delivered from my foes! taking me to death’s door, and from your temple-throne you heard my troubled cry, It reeled and rocked before him. As the mountains trembled, they melted away, for his anger was kindled on my behalf! erupting with blazing, burning coals as smoke and fire encircled him. Swiftly he rode to earth as the stormy sky was lowered. He rode a chariot of thunderclouds amidst thick darkness; his steed was a cherub, soaring on outstretched wings of Spirit-Wind. his thunder-tabernacle surrounded him. He hid himself in mystery-darkness; the dense rain clouds were his garments. with lightning bolts and hail— a tempest dropping coals of fire. spoke with his thunder-voice from the sky. The Most High uttered his voice! See how they ran and scattered in fear! uncovering the secret source of the sea. The hidden depths of land and sea were exposed by the blast of his hot breath. and drew me to himself! you were good to deliver me. but the Lord held on to me. I’ll not sin by ceasing to follow him, no matter what. and I’ve obeyed everything that he’s told me to do. keeping my heart pure. because I kept my heart clean before his eyes. And to those who are loyal to you, you love to prove that you are loyal and true. But you’ll outwit the crooked and cunning with your craftiness. but the proud and haughty you disregard. You are the revelation-light in my darkness, and in your brightness I can see the path ahead. All Yahweh’s promises have proven true. What a secure shelter for all those who turn to hide themselves in you, and made my way perfect. my arms can bend a bow of bronze. Your power within makes me strong to subdue. By stooping down in gentleness, you made me great! ready to fight some more ! and didn’t turn back until the war was won! I finished them once and for all; they’re as good as dead. and made my enemies bow low at my feet. for through you I’ve destroyed them all! They cried out to Yahweh, but he refused to answer them. I swept them away like dirt on the floor. for you make me a leader of nations. Even those I’ve never heard of come and bow at my feet. Even the rebel foreigners obey my every word. trembling in their strongholds, they come crawling out of their hideouts, cringing in fear before me. Praise is lifted high to the unshakable God! Towering over all, my Savior-God is worthy to be praised! subduing all who come against me. he lifts me up high and keeps me out of reach, far from the grasp of my violent foe. I will sing my song to the highest God, You’ve always been tender and kind to me, your anointed one, your loving servant, David, and to all my descendants!

Yahweh, you’re the bedrock beneath my feet, the mighty power that saves me, and torrents of destruction overwhelmed me, and my sobs went right into your heart. of my hateful, strong enemy, and he brought me into a beautiful, broad place. in my distress I cried out to you, the delivering God,

Even though I was helpless in the hands
When I was at my weakest, my enemies attacked—
His love broke open the way,
He rewarded me for doing what’s right and staying pure.
I will follow his commands and
For I’ve kept my eyes focused on his righteous words,
I’ve been blameless before him and followed all his ways,
And so Yahweh has rewarded me according to my righteousness,
Good people will taste your goodness .
And for those who are purified, they find you always pure.
To the humble you bring heaven’s deliverance,
God, all at once you turned on a floodlight for me!
With you as my strength I can crush an enemy horde,
Yahweh, what a perfect God you are!
Could there be any other god like Yahweh?
God, you have wrapped me in power

I smashed them to pieces and
You’ve placed your armor upon me

They shouted for help, but no one dared to rescue them.
So I pulverized them to powder and cast them to the wind.

As soon as they heard of me they submitted to me.
Their rebellion fades away as they come near;
Yahweh lives!
Look how he pays back harm to all who harm me,
He rescues me from my enemies;
So I thank you, Yahweh, with my praises!
You have given me, your king, great victories.

19.verse_text: God’s splendor is a tale that is told, written in the stars. my only Redeemer, my Protector. Space itself speaks his story through the marvels of the heavens. His truth is on tour in the starry vault of the sky, showing his skill in creation’s craftsmanship. night by night whispering its knowledge to all— Everywhere its message goes out. What a heavenly home God has set for the sun, shining in the superdome of the sky! radiant as a bridegroom ready for his wedding, like a day-breaking champion eager to run his course. warming lives and lands with his heat. how it revives our souls! Yahweh’s laws lead us to truth, and his ways change the simple into wise. his precepts are so pure! Yahweh’s commands challenge us to keep close to his heart! The revelation-light of his Word makes my spirit shine radiant. The fear of Yahweh is pure, enduring forever. That’s why God’s Word is prized like others prize the finest gold. Sweeter also than honey are his living words— sweet words dripping from the honeycomb! and keep us from following the wicked way, giving a lifetime guarantee: great success to every obedient soul! Lord, forgive my hidden flaws whenever you find them. and keep me from my secret, selfish sins; may they never rule over me! For only then will I be free from fault and remain innocent of rebellion. and every movement of my heart be always pure and pleasing, acceptable before your eyes, Yahweh,
Each day gushes out its message to the next,
without a sound, without a word, without a voice being heard,
yet all the world can hear its echo.
See how he leaves his celestial chamber each morning,
He rises on one horizon, completing his circuit on the other,
Yahweh’s Word is perfect in every way;
Yahweh’s teachings are right and make us joyful;
The rarest treasures of life are found in his truth.
For they warn us, your servants,
How would I discern the waywardness of my heart?
So may the words of my mouth, my meditation-thoughts,

20.verse_text: In your day of danger may Yahweh answer and deliver you. May the name of the God of Jacob set you safely on high! and celebrate every sacrifice of love you have shown him.

May supernatural help be sent from his sanctuary. May he support you from Zion’s fortress! Pause in his presence and carry out your every plan as you go to battle . Flags will fly when victory is yours! Yes, God will answer your prayers, and we will praise him! and brings victory to his anointed king. My deliverance cry will be heard in his holy heaven. By his mighty hand miracles will manifest through his saving strength. but my miracle-deliverance can never be won by men. Our boast is in Yahweh our God, who makes us strong and gives us victory! perish in defeat while we will rise up, full of courage. The day we call on you, give us your answer!
May he remember every gift you have given him
May Yahweh give you every desire of your heart
When you succeed, we will celebrate and shout for joy.
I know Yahweh gives me all that I ask for
Some find their strength in their weapons and wisdom,
Our enemies will not prevail; they will only collapse and
Give victory to our king, O Yahweh!

21.verse_text: Yahweh, because of your strength the king is strong. Look how he rejoices in you! He bursts out with a joyful song because of your victory! anything and everything he asks for. You haven’t withheld a thing from the king. Pause in his presence and you placed a royal crown of gold upon his head. The days of his blessing stretch on one after another, forever! Glory-garments are upon him, and you surround him with splendor and majesty. and he will never stumble, never fall. The forever-love of the Most High holds him firm. You uncovered all who hate you and you seized them. unveiling the radiance of your face , they will be consumed by the fierce fire of your presence. Yahweh’s flames will swallow them up. They and their descendants will be destroyed by an unrelenting fire. for these are the ones who plan their evil schemes against the Lord. aimed straight at their hearts. By your strength we will sing and praise your glorious power!
For you have given him his heart’s desire,
Rich blessings overflow with every encounter with you,
He wanted life —you have given it to him and more!
You have honored him and made him famous.
Your victory heaps blessing after blessing upon him. What joy and bliss he tastes, rejoicing before your face!
For the king trusts in Yahweh,
Your almighty hands have captured your foes.
They will turn and run at the sight of your judgment-arrows
Rise up and put your might on display!

22.verse_text: God, my God! Why would you abandon me now? refusing to answer my tearful cries in the day crushed and bleeding crimson, forces of evil encircle me like the strong bulls of Bashan. Save my precious one and only from the power of these dogs! and praise you in the midst of the congregation. And they will all declare, “It is finished!”

Why do you remain distant, and my desperate cries for your help in the night? I can’t stop sobbing. Where are you, my God? You are God-Enthroned, the praise of Israel. through the generations they trusted in you and you came through. you were faithful to deliver them; you didn’t disappoint them. treated as less than human. I’ve been despised and scorned by everyone! as all the people poke fun at me, spitting their insults, Now let’s see if Yahweh will come to your rescue! Let’s see how much he delights in him!” You are the one who cared for me ever since I was a baby. You’ve cradled me throughout my days, and you’ve always been my God. and there’s no one to help me. they pour curses from their mouths. Every joint of my body has been pulled apart. My courage has melted away. My tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth. And now you lay me in the dust of death. Like a pack of wild dogs they tear at me, swirling around me with their hatred. A band of evil men surrounds me. Look at how they gloat over me and stare! gambling for my garments! My strength, come quickly to my rescue. Save me from this violent death. from this roaring lion raging against me and the power of his dark horde. Let all the seed of Jacob glorify him with your praises. Stand in awe of him, all you offspring of Israel! He’s my first responder to my sufferings, and when I was in pain, he was there all the time and heard the cries of the afflicted. I will keep my promise to praise you before all who fear you among the congregation of your people. Bring Yahweh praise and you will find him. May your hearts overflow with life forever! the peoples of the world will remember and return to Yahweh. Every nation will come and worship him. right alongside the humble of heart, bowing down to the dust, forsaking their own souls. They will all come and worship this worthy King! Future generations will hear from us about the wonders of the Victorious Lord.
Yet I know that you are most holy.
Our fathers’ faith was in you—
Every time they cried out to you in their despair,
But I am like a worm,
Mocked by their jeers, despised with their sneers,
saying, “Is this the one who trusted in God?
Lord, you delivered me safely from my mother’s womb.
Since the day I was born, I’ve been placed in your custody.
So don’t leave me now, for trouble is all around me,
I’m surrounded by many violent foes like bulls;
Like ravenous, roaring lions tearing their prey,
Now I’m completely exhausted.
I’m so thirsty and parched.
They have pierced my hands and my feet.
I can count all my bones.
With a toss of the dice they divide my clothes among themselves,
Yahweh, please don’t stay far away.
Give me back my life.
Save me from all the power of the enemy,
I will declare your name before all my brothers
Those who fear Yahweh, praise him!
For he has not despised my cries of deep despair.
You’re the reason for my praise; it comes from you and goes to you.
Let all the poor and broken eat until satisfied.
From the four corners of the earth,
For Yahweh is King of all, who takes charge of all the nations.
The wealthy of this world will feast in fellowship with him
His spiritual seed shall serve him.
His generation yet to be born will glorify him.

23.verse_text: Yahweh is my best friend and my shepherd. I always have more than enough. His tracks take me to an oasis of peace near the quiet brook of bliss . and leads me along in his footsteps of righteousness Your authority is my strength and my peace. You anoint me with the fragrance of your Holy Spirit; you give me all I can drink of you until my cup overflows. I’ll return to your glorious presence to be forever with you!
He offers a resting place for me in his luxurious love.

That’s where he restores and revives my life. He opens before me the right path so that I can bring honor to his name. the valley of deepest darkness, fear will never conquer me, for you already have! The comfort of your love takes away my fear. I’ll never be lonely, for you are near. even when my enemies dare to fight. Only goodness and tender love pursue me all the days of my life. Then afterward, when my life is through,
Even when your path takes me through
So why would I fear the future?

24.verse_text: Yahweh claims the world as his. Everything and everyone belong to him! to let the dry ground appear, planting firm foundations for the earth. And who has the privilege of entering into God’s Holy Place? whose hearts are true and sealed by the truth, those who never deceive, whose words are sure. and righteousness given by the Savior-God. Pause in his presence Welcome the King of Glory, for he is about to come through you. Yahweh, armed and ready for battle, Yahweh, invincible in every way! Fling wide, you eternal doors! Here he comes; the King of Glory is ready to come in. He is Yahweh, armed and ready for battle, Yes, he is the King of Glory! Pause in his presence
He’s the one who pushed back oceans
Who, then, is allowed to ascend the mountain of Yahweh?
Those who are clean—whose works and ways are pure,
They will stand before God, for they seek the pleasure of God’s face, the God of Jacob. Lift up your heads, you doorways of eternity! the Mighty One, the invincible commander of heaven’s hosts!
So wake up, you living gateways!
You ask, “Who is this King of Glory?”
So wake up, you living gateways, and rejoice!
You ask, “Who is this King of Glory?”

25.verse_text: Always I will lift up my soul into your presence, Yahweh.

Be there for me , my God, for I keep trusting in you. Don’t allow my foes to gloat over me or the shame of defeat to overtake me. when he has entwined his heart with yours? But my foes will all be defeated and ashamed when they harm the innocent. so I can experience your plans for my life. Reveal the life-paths that are pleasing to you . For you are the God of my salvation; and overlook the sins of my immaturity. Give me grace, Yahweh! Always look at me through your eyes of love— your forgiving eyes of mercy and compassion. When you think of me, see me as one you love and care for. When people turn to you, Yahweh, they discover how easy you are to please—so faithful and true! Joyfully you teach them the proper path, even when they go astray. and lead them into the best decision. Bring revelation-light that trains them in the truth. never count my many sins, and forgive them all— You will show them the right path to take. and their descendants will inherit the earth. where they sit near him and receive I’m all alone and in misery! Come closer to me now, for I need your mercy. Only you can free me from all these troubles! my troubles and trials will be more than I can handle. Can’t you feel my pain? There are so many, Lord. Can’t you see? Let it never be said that when I trusted you, you didn’t come to my rescue. for you are my hope and I trust in you as my only protection. to come save Israel from all her troubles,
Could anyone be disgraced
Direct me, Yahweh, throughout my journey

Escort me into your truth; take me by the hand and teach me. I have wrapped my heart into yours all day long! lift their burden off of my life! the revelation-secrets of his promises. for you provide the ransom price for your people!
How good you are to me!
Keep showing the humble your path,
Loving are all the ways of Yahweh, loving and faithful for those who keep his covenant.
For the honor of your name, Yahweh,
Who are they that live in the holy fear of Yahweh?
Then prosperity and favor will be their portion,
There’s a private place reserved for the devoted lovers of Yahweh,
Rescue me, Yahweh, for you free my feet from every trap.
Sorrows fill my heart as I feel helpless, mistreated—
Turn to me, for my problems seem to be going from bad to worse.
Until you lift this burden, the burden of all my sins,
Vicious, violent enemies hate me.
Will you protect me from their power against me? I have taken shelter in you.
Your perfection and faithfulness are my bodyguards,
Zealously, God, we ask you

26.verse_text: Yahweh, be my judge and declare me innocent! Clear my name, for I walk in integrity and trust you without wavering. Refine my heart and probe my every thought. Put me to the test and you’ll find me true. Your faithfulness has steadied my steps. nor will I go the way of those with hidden motives. You won’t find me walking with the wicked. approaching with songs of thanksgiving, singing songs of your mighty miracles. who plot violence against the innocent. their hands are always ready to receive a bribe. Save me, redeem me with your mercy, for I have chosen to walk only in what is right. for I am safe and secure because of you!
I will never lose sight of your steadfast love for me.
I won’t keep company with tricky, two-faced men,
Yahweh, I love to live in your house, this dwelling place of dazzling glory!
Don’t treat me as one of these scheming sinners
Look how they devise their wicked plans;
I’m not like them, Lord—not at all .
Among the worshipers I will praise Yahweh,

27.verse_text: Yahweh is my revelation-light and the source of my salvation. I fear no one! I’ll never turn back and run, for you, Yahweh, surround and protect me. they will be the ones who turn back. I will not be shaken, even if war is imminent. the one thing I seek above all else: filled with awe, delighting in his glory and grace. under the cover of his tent. He will lift me high upon a rock, out of reach from all my enemies who surround me. Triumphant now, I’ll bring him my offerings of praise, singing and shouting with ecstatic joy! Yes, I will sing praises to Yahweh! my inner being responded, “Yahweh, I’m seeking your face with all my heart.” You’re the God of my salvation; how can you reject your servant in anger? You’ve been my only hope, so don’t forsake me now when I need you! Make it clear for me to understand, for I am surrounded by waiting enemies. You can’t let me fall into their clutches! They keep accusing me of things I’ve never done, breathing out violence against me. that I will see again your goodness, Yahweh, in the land of life eternal! Don’t give up ; don’t be impatient; Be brave and courageous, and never lose hope. Yes, keep on waiting— for he will never disappoint you !
When evil ones come to destroy me,
My heart will not fear even if an army rises to attack.

Here’s the one thing I crave from Yahweh, I want to live with him every moment in his house, beholding the marvelous beauty of Yahweh, I want to contemplate in his temple. But you, Yahweh, took me in and made me yours. be entwined as one with the Lord.
Hear my cry. Show me mercy, and send the help I need!
I heard your voice in my heart say, “Come, seek my face;”
So don’t turn your face away from me.
My father and mother abandoned me.
Now teach me, Yahweh, all about your ways and tell me what to do.
Don’t let them defeat me, Lord.
Yet I believe with all my heart
Here’s what I’ve learned through it all:

28.verse_text: I’m pleading with you, Yahweh, help me! Don’t close your ears to my cry, for you’re my defender. If you continue to remain aloof and refuse to answer me, I might as well give up and die. as I lift my hands toward your sacred sanctuary. these hypocrites who speak sweetly to their neighbors’ faces while holding evil against them in their hearts. Let them be paid back for all their evil plans in proportion to their wickedness. or understand the great things you’ve done, take them down like an old building being demolished , never again to be rebuilt. For you have answered my passionate cry for mercy. When I fully trust in you, help is on the way. I jump for joy and burst forth with ecstatic, passionate praise! I will sing songs of what you mean to me! Yahweh, the mighty protector of all, and the saving strength for all your anointed ones. Be our shepherd leading us forward, forever carrying us in your arms!
Hear my cry for help as I turn toward your mercy seat,
Don’t allow me to be punished along with the wicked—
Go ahead and punish them as they deserve.
Since they don’t care anything about you,
But Yahweh, may your name be blessed and built up !
Yahweh is my strength and my wraparound shield.
You will be the inner strength of all your people,
Save your people whom you love, and bless your chosen ones.

29.verse_text: Proclaim his majesty, all you mighty sons of Yahweh, giving all the glory and strength back to him! Be in awe before such power and might! Come worship wonderful Yahweh, arrayed in all his splendor, bowing in worship as he appears in the beauty of holiness. Give him the honor due his name. Worship him wearing the glory-garments of your holy, priestly calling! The Glory-God reigns as he thunders in the clouds. So powerful is his voice, so brilliant and bright— His symphonic sound splinters the mighty forests. shaking the snowy peaks with his earsplitting sound! shaking deserts, speaking his voice. His thunderbolt-voice lays the forest bare. In his temple all fall before him with each one shouting, the King-God rules with eternity at his side.
Be in awe before his majesty.
His tympanic thunder topples the strongest of trees.
Now he moves Zion’s mountains by the might of his voice,
The lightning-fire flashes, striking as he speaks.
God reveals himself when he makes the fault lines quake,
God’s mighty voice makes the deer to give birth.
Above the furious flood, the Enthroned One reigns,
This is the one who gives his strength and might to his people.

30.verse_text: Lord, I will exalt you and lift you high, for you have lifted me up on high! Over all my boasting, gloating enemies, you made me to triumph. I cried out for a miracle and you healed me! from the depths below. Now here I am, alive and well, fully restored! Give thanks to him every time you reflect on his holiness! We may weep through the night, but at daybreak it will turn into shouts of ecstatic joy. Nothing can stop me now! I’m God’s favored one; he’s made me steady as a mountain!” But then suddenly, you hid your face from me. I was panic-stricken and became depressed. if I were to go down to the depths of darkness? Will a grave sing your song? How could death’s dust declare your faithfulness?” O God, be my Savior and rescue me! into a whirling dance of ecstatic praise! He has torn the veil and lifted from me the sad heaviness of mourning. He wrapped me in the glory-garments of gladness. Now my heart sings out, bursting with joy— a bliss inside that keeps me singing, “I can never thank you enough!”
You brought me back from the brink of death,
O sing and make melody, you steadfast lovers of God.
I’ve learned that his anger lasts for a moment, but his loving favor lasts a lifetime!
Still I cried out to you, Lord God. I shouted out for mercy, saying,
“What would you gain in my death,
So hear me now, Lord; show me your famous mercy.
Then he broke through and transformed all my wailing
How could I be silent when it’s time to praise you?

31.verse_text: I trust you, Lord, to be my hiding place. Don’t let me down. Don’t let my enemies bring me to shame. Come and rescue me, for you are the only God who always does what is right. At the sound of my prayer may your ear be turned to me. Be my strong shelter and hiding place on high. Pull me into victory and breakthrough. You are to me a stronghold of salvation. When you deliver me out of this peril, it will bring glory to your name. As you guide me forth I’ll be kept safe from the hidden snares of the enemy— the secret traps that lie before me— for you have become my rock of strength. O Lord, the God of faithfulness, you have rescued and redeemed me. all this pretense and nonsense, for I worship only you. even during this crisis in my soul I will be radiant with joy, filled with praise for your love and mercy. For I am in anguish, always in tears, and I’m worn out with weeping. I’m becoming old because of grief; my health is broken. my years with sighing and sadness. Because of all these troubles, I have no more strength. Even my friends and neighbors hold me in contempt! They dread seeing me, and they look the other way when I pass by. discarded like a broken dish thrown in the trash. I’m terrified as they plot and scheme to take my life. for you alone are my God! So I know you can deliver me from those who persecute me relentlessly. Let your undying love and glorious grace save me from all this gloom. be replaced by your favor once again. But let shame and disgrace fall instead upon the wicked— those going to their own doom, drifting down in silence to the dust of death. For they are arrogant, filled with contempt and conceit as they speak against the godly. You have stored up so many good things for us, like a treasure chest heaped up and spilling over with blessings— all for those who honor and worship you! Everybody knows what you can do for those who turn and hide themselves in you. in the sheltered, secret place before your face. Overshadow them with your glory-presence. Keep them from these accusations, the brutal insults of evil men. Tuck them safely away in the tabernacle where you dwell. For his marvelous miracle of mercy protected me when I was overwhelmed by my enemies. For in truth, you did hear my prayer and came to rescue me. The Lord protects and preserves all those who are loyal to him. But he pays back in full all those who reject him in their pride. Wait for him to break through for you, all who trust in him!
Rescue me quickly when I cry out to you.
Into your hands I now entrust my spirit.
I despise these deceptive illusions,
In mercy you have seen my troubles, and you have cared for me;
You have kept me from being conquered by my enemy; you broke open the way to bring me to freedom, into a beautiful, broad place. My inner being is so weak and frail.
O Lord, help me again! Keep showing me such mercy.
I’m exhausted! My life is spent with sorrow,
My enemies say, “You are nothing!”
I am totally forgotten, buried away like a dead man,
I overheard their whispered threats, the slander of my enemies.
I’m desperate, Lord! I throw myself upon you,
My life, my every moment, my destiny—it’s all in your hands.
Smile on me, your servant.
As I call upon you, let my shame and disgrace
At last their lying lips will be muted in their graves.
Lord, how wonderful you are!
So hide all your beloved ones
The name of the Lord is blessed and lifted high!
I spoke hastily when I said, “The Lord has deserted me.”
Listen to me, all you godly ones: Love the Lord with passion!
So cheer up! Take courage, all you who love him.

32.verse_text: What bliss belongs to the one whose rebellion has been forgiven, who have confessed their corruption to God! those whose sins are covered by blood . For he wipes their slates clean and removes hypocrisy from their hearts. my dishonesty devastated my inner life, causing my life to be filled with frustration, irrepressible anguish, and misery. was heavy on my heart. My strength was sapped, my inner life dried up like a spiritual drought within my soul. Pause in his presence refusing to hide them any longer. I said, “My life-giving God, I will openly acknowledge my evil actions.” And you forgave me! All at once the guilt of my sin washed away and all my pain disappeared! Pause in his presence All believers should confess their sins to God; do it every time God has uncovered you in the time of exposing. For if you do this, when sudden storms of life overwhelm, you’ll be kept safe. protecting me from these troubles, surrounding me with songs of gladness! Your joyous shouts of rescue release my breakthrough. Pause in his presence instructing and guiding you along the pathway for your life. I will advise you along the way and lead you forth with my eyes as your guide. So don’t make it difficult; don’t be stubborn when I take you where you’ve not been before. Don’t make me tug you and pull you along. Just come with me!” Many are the sorrows and frustrations of those who don’t come clean with God. But when you trust in the Lord for forgiveness, his wraparound love will surround you. He shows this kindness to everyone who is his. Go ahead—shout for joy, all you upright ones who want to please him!
Before I confessed my sins, I kept it all inside;
The pain never let up, for your hand of conviction
Then I finally admitted to you all my sins,
This is what I’ve learned through it all:
Lord, you are my secret hiding place,
So celebrate the goodness of God!

33.verse_text: It’s time to sing and shout for joy! Go ahead, all you redeemed ones, do it! Praise him with all you have, for praise looks lovely on the lips of God’s devoted lovers. Sing and make joyous music with all you’ve got inside. Play his praises on instruments with the anointing and skill he gives you. Sing and shout with passion; make a spectacular sound of joy— He is true to his promises, his word can be trusted, and everything he does is reliable and right. Anywhere and everywhere you can find his faithful, unfailing love! and God created the heavenlies. Filled with galaxies and stars, the vast cosmos he wonderfully made. The ocean depths he poured into vast reservoirs. let everyone worship Yahweh, this awe-inspiring Creator. “Let there be,” and there it was— springing forth the moment he spoke, no sooner said than done! they will never succeed. His forever-plan remains in place and will never fail. They will be the people he has chosen for his own. Gazing into every heart from his lofty dwelling place, he observes all the peoples of the earth. The Creator of our hearts considers and examines everything we do. it would never be enough to save him. Even if the best warrior went to battle, he could not be saved simply by his strength alone. are false hopes for victory; they may seem mighty, but they will always disappoint. even the weakest worshipers who love him— those who wait in hope and expectation for the strong, steady love of God. even the certain death of famine, with no one to help. and we trust in him with all our hearts. His wraparound presence will strengthen us. flowing from Yahweh! for we trust and we wait upon you!
Play the guitar as you lift your praises loaded with thanksgiving.
Compose new melodies that release new praises to the Lord.
For God’s Word is something to sing about!
The Lord loves seeing justice on the earth.
All he had to do was speak by his Spirit-Wind command,
His voice scooped out the seas.
He breathed words and worlds were birthed.
With his breath he scatters the schemes of nations who oppose him;
His destiny-plan for the earth stands sure.
Blessed and prosperous is that nation who has God as their Lord!
Even if a king had the best-equipped army,
Human strength and the weapons of man
The eyes of the Lord are upon
God will deliver them from death,
The Lord alone is our radiant hope
As we trust, we rejoice with an uncontained joy
Let your love and steadfast kindness overshadow us continually,

34.verse_text: Lord! I’m bursting with joy over what you’ve done for me! My lips are full of perpetual praise. so let all who are discouraged take heart. Let’s make him famous! Let’s make his name glorious to all. and he answered me. He freed me from all my fears! Your faces will glisten with glory. You’ll never wear that shame-face again. I cried out to the Lord and he heard me, encircling me, empowering me, and showing me how to escape. He will do this for everyone who fears God. Experience for yourself the joyous mercies he gives to all who turn to hide themselves in him. For all who fear him will feast with plenty. but those who passionately pursue the Lord will never lack any good thing. I’ll share the lesson I’ve learned of fearing the Lord: enjoying the beauty that fills each day? Then never speak a lie or allow wicked words to come from your mouth. and make “peace” your life motto. he watches over his friends day and night. His godly ones receive the answers they seek whenever they cry out to him. and to wipe out even the memory of them to him with all their hearts, the Lord will hear them and come to rescue them from all their troubles. and he is always ready to restore the repentant one. the Lord will save them and not let them be defeated by what they face. when trouble is near. Not one bone will be broken. for they hate and persecute the devoted lovers of God. Make no mistake about it: God will hold them guilty and punish them; they will pay the penalty! and he will freely pardon those who love him. He will declare them free and innocent when they turn to hide themselves in him.
I’m boasting of you and all your works,
Join me, everyone! Let’s praise the Lord together.
Listen to my testimony: I cried to God in my distress
Gaze upon him, join your life with his, and joy will come.
When I had nothing, desperate and defeated, bringing his miracle-deliverance when I needed it most. Practice being at peace with everyone. from the face of the earth.
The angel of Yahweh stooped down to listen as I prayed,
Drink deeply of the pleasures of this God.
Worship in awe and wonder, all you who’ve been made holy!
Even the strong and the wealthy grow weak and hungry,
Come, children of God, and listen to me.
Keep turning your back on every sin,
The Lord sees all we do;
But the Lord has made up his mind to oppose evildoers
Yet when holy lovers of God cry out
The Lord is close to all whose hearts are crushed by pain,
Even when bad things happen to the good and godly ones,
God will be your bodyguard to protect you
Evil will cause the death of the wicked,
But the Lord has paid for the freedom of his servants,

35.verse_text: O Lord, fight for me! Harass the hecklers; accuse my accusers. Fight those who fight against me. Rise up, mighty God! Grab your weapons of war and block the way of the wicked who come to fight me. Stand for me when they stand against me! Frustrate their plans to defeat me and drive them back. Disgrace them all as they have devised their plans to disgrace me. with the angel of Almighty God driving them back! with the angel of Yahweh behind them, chasing them away! wanting me to fail and fall. and catch them in the very trap they set for me. Let them be the ones to fail and fall into destruction! my whole being will overflow with gladness because of your mighty deliverance. “There’s no one like you, Lord!” For look at how you protect the weak and helpless from the strong and heartless who oppress them. They rise up against me, accusers appearing out of nowhere. I’m forsaken and forlorn, like a motherless child. I was burdened and bowed low with fasting and interceded for their healing, and I didn’t stop praying. as though they were my dearest family members or my good friends who were sick, nearing death, needing prayer. they came together to slander me, rejoicing in my time of trouble, tearing me to shreds with their lies and betrayal. mocking me like godless fools at a feast— how they delight in throwing mud on my name. Now is the time to act. Rescue me from these brutal men, for I am being torn to shreds by these beasts who are out to get me. Save me from their rage, their cruel grasp. And when everyone gathers for worship, I will lift up your praise with a shout in front of the largest crowd I can find! Don’t let them succeed, these heartless haters who come against me with their gloating sneers. for they are ever devising deceit against the innocent ones who mind their own business. gloating with glee over my every fault. “Look,” they say, “we caught him red-handed! We saw him fall with our own eyes!” You have seen their hypocrisy. Yahweh, don’t let them get away with this. Don’t walk away without doing something. Vindicate me, my Lord and my God! according to your righteousness, but don’t let them rejoice over me when I stumble. humiliated when they rejoice over my every blunder. Shame them, Lord, when they say, “We saw what he did. Now we have him right where we want him. Let’s get him while he’s down!” Make them look ridiculous when they exalt themselves over me. May they all be disgraced and dishonored! all those who know and love what I do for you. Let them all say, “The Lord is great, and he delights in the prosperity of his servant.” everyone will hear my joyous praises all day long! Your righteousness will be the theme of my glory-song of praise!
Humiliate those who seek my harm. Defeat them all!
Blow them away like dust in the wind,
Make the road in front of them nothing but slippery darkness,
For though I did nothing wrong to them, they set a trap for me,
Surprise them with your ambush, Lord,
